arts.ttl: Omar Marmoush magic propels Eintracht Frankfurt to victory over Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: Omar Marmoush scored his fourth goal of the season as Eintracht Frankfurt beat Borussia Mönchengladbach 2-0 in an exciting Bundesliga clash at Deutsche Bank Park. Both teams entered the match with key players sidelined, as Frankfurt's first-choice goalkeeper Kevin Trapp was out with a thigh injury, while Gladbach's captain Jonas Omlin was unavailable due to a calf issue.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Eintracht Frankfurt 2-0 Borussia Mönchengladbach
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt comfortably beat Borussia Mönchengladbach 2-0 with goals from Hugo Larsson and Omar Marmoush on Saturday evening. Even in terms of ball possession but Frankurt were the better side…

arts.ttl: Hugo Ekitiké spreading his wings at Eintracht Frankfurt
arts.sum: Close, too, is the partnership with Marmoush, Frankfurt's Egypt international who - with three Bundesliga goals to date - is currently challenging the likes of Bayern Munich's Harry Kane and Andrej Kramarić of Hoffenheim for the lead in the division's top scorer race. From forming a formidable strike partnership with Omar Marmoush to scoring on his debut for France Under-21s, the 6'3" striker is understandably ecstatic with life right now.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Gladbach preview: Die Adler targeting third straight win
arts.sum: Frankfurt will look to claim a third consecutive victory when they play host to Borussia Mönchengladbach in Saturday’s Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: Preview: Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Eintracht Frankfurt and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
